name: railsync
description: Shop Loading Tool for railcar repair shop assignment

scripts.ralph: npm run lint:all ; npm run build:all
scripts.ralph:fix: npm run lint:fix:all ; npm run build:all
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.verify: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.db:setup: psql -U postgres -c "CREATE DATABASE railsync;" && psql -U postgres -d railsync -f database/schema.sql && psql -U postgres -d railsync -f database/seed.sql
